name: Exorcist Practice
description:
The Game of The Year, The Modern Marvel of Game Industry,  The-Game-Changer

Fine-tuned settings, Unpredictable Monster Waves Spawn, The-Oscar-type Cutscene!.. - E-e-e-e, yadah-yadah..

This is the simplest clicker with monsters fading in and out between shadow and light. A fine young exorcist, such as yourself, should try to keep this monsters away  from the chamber you're in for a definitive period of time. 

Good luck

_________________________________________________________

_________________________________________________________

This is the first game I made all by myself, excluding Music and SFX. It was started in June of this year with GMTK Jam. The original concept transformed into a different idea but I think it's for the better

_________________________________________________________

_________________________________________________________

Controlls

Click - to kill monsters and knock

Esc for exit the game

Space for all other options
